name: Interplanetary Courier
description:
Interplanetary Courier: A Hexahedron Delivery Adventure!

Created for the /r/webgames Game Jam #2. Theme: Space

For the theme, we took a two-sided approach to it. The game is set in outer space, which is obvious. We also have the player managing the space in their ship grid to choose appropriate upgrades.

When you complete 6 deliveries, you've exhausted all the content, though the game will allow you to keep playing endlessly.

I hope you enjoy it, and thanks for playing!

Code & Design: /u/FaeDine
Art & Design: /u/newaccount1846204720
Music: /u/mangopear (Soundcloud)
